attributes.action: Sanction Israel for West Bank Annexations and breaking International Law!
attributes.additional_details: Boris Johnson must act on this and pressurise his counterpart in Israel to avoid further escalation and tension between the Palestinians and Israeli’s. A peace plan can never work if the international community doesn’t respond to the illegal actions Israel has been pressing on for many years. The PM must listen to the concerns of the British public and members of Parliament who share the same concerns as us!
attributes.background: The UK Government must apply sanctions on Israel for the continued oppression against Palestinians and illegal settlements across the West Bank. 130 MPs have already expressed concern over this growing issue caused by international law breaker Benjamin Netanyahu and his goverment.
